mapper.select: select o.shopNo, p.paymentDate, sum(p.paymentPrice) sumPrice from orderBase o, payment p where 1=1 AND o.orderNo = p.orderNo AND o.orderStatus = 2 AND o.shopNo = #{shopNo} group by o.shopNo, paymentDate order by paymentDate

select o.shopNo, p.paymentDate, sum(p.paymentPrice) sumPrice from orderBase o, payment p where 1=1 AND o.orderNo = p.orderNo AND o.orderStatus = 2
and o.shopNo in
#{item}
group by o.shopNo, paymentDate order by paymentDate

select week, sumPrice from( select p.paymentDate, sum(p.paymentPrice) sumPrice from orderBase o, payment p where 1=1 AND o.orderNo = p.orderNo AND o.orderStatus = 2 AND p.paymentDate BETWEEN SYSDATE-7 AND SYSDATE AND o.shopNo = #{shopNo} group by o.shopNo, paymentDate order by paymentDate) A RIGHT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - LEVEL, 'YYYY-MM-DD') week FROM DUAL WHERE 1=1 CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 7 ) B ON A.paymentdate = B.week ORDER BY week

select pr.productName, sum(op.productCnt) cnt from orderBase o, payment p, orderProduct op, product pr where 1=1 AND o.orderNo = p.orderNo AND o.orderNo = op.orderno AND op.productNo = pr.productNo AND o.orderStatus = 2 AND o.shopNo = #{shopNo} group by productName
